        public void createQuestion(Question question,
                           Quiz quiz)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           CreateFailedException

        Creates a Question in the database

        If a problem occurs throws a CreateFailedException

        usage example : QuestionJDBCDAO questiondao = new... try{ questiondao.createQuestion (QuestionInstance, QuizInstance)}; catch (CreateFailed e)
        Parameters:
        question - The question that is created
        quiz - The quiz associated with the question
        Throws:
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the question is not created
        java.sql.SQLException

      • readQuestionsByTopics

        public java.util.List<Question> readQuestionsByTopics(java.lang.String topics)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                      ReadFailedException

        Gets a list of Questions for given topics

        The topics given by the user are used as search criterion to select the questions

        A question may be related to 2 topics and can be fetched twice. To eliminate duplicates, the question_id when fetched is stored in a Hashset. If a question is fetched the second time, it is ignored

        If a problem occurs throws ReadFailedException

        usage example : QuestionJDBCDAO questiondao = new .. try{ questiondao.readQuestionsByTopics(Topics);} catch (ReadFailed e)
        Parameters:
        topics - the topics associated with the Questions
        Returns:
        questionlist returns a list of questions
        Throws:
        ReadFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the there is a problem getting the questions list
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteQuestionByQuizId

        public void deleteQuestionByQuizId(Quiz quiz)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                   DeleteFailedException

        Deletes the Questions of a quiz

        This method is called when a quiz is deleted

        When a quiz is deleted, all the Questions associated with the quiz are deleted to preserve the referential integrity

        If a problem occurs throws the DeleteFailedException

        usage example : QuestionJDBCDAO questiondao = new .. try{ questiondao.deleteQuestionByQuizId(QuizInstance);} catch (ReadFailed e)
        Parameters:
        quiz - that quiz associated with the questions
        Throws:
        DeleteFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the Question is not deleted
        java.sql.SQLException
